definition: to replay/to rerun/(agriculture) to reseed/to oversow
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: You constantly replay past confrontations, conversations and situations in your head.
sentences.chinese: 你会不断地在脑中重播过去的遭遇，对话和情境。

sentences.english: After “Life” completes its run on Discovery, the episodes will be shown again in order on the Animal Planet channel.
sentences.chinese: 等探索频道播完全集，动物星球频道将接着进行重播。

sentences.english: In fact, re-read this section in your normal voice and play it back.
sentences.chinese: 用你正常的声音再读一次这部分然后重播。

sentences.english: The messages of the second day transmission were a rebroadcast.
sentences.chinese: 这些电文通常在播出后的次日有一次重播。

sentences.english: The TV station is airing reruns of my favorite soap opera.
sentences.chinese: 该电视台正在播放我最爱的连续剧重播。

sentences.english: Editing with the Replay tool is done in takes.
sentences.chinese: 使用重播工具的编辑是组合不同分镜达成的。

sentences.english: It has been widely rebroadcast by Nigerian TV and radio stations.
sentences.chinese: 同时在尼日利亚电视台和广播重播。

sentences.english: They simply turned to watching reruns or surfing the Web.
sentences.chinese: 他们只会去看重播，或者去上网。

sentences.english: Maybe it's a rerun we haven't seen yet.
sentences.chinese: 也许重播的是我们没看过的那集。

sentences.english: Accurate progressive scanning technology, high definition image rebroadcast, reproducing ultimate beautiful pictures.
sentences.chinese: 精确逐行扫描技术，高清晰影像重播，再现至美画面。

sentences.english: Besides, all the episodes of "Friends" are just reruns now.
sentences.chinese: 而且现在的老友记都是在重播而已。

sentences.english: Broadcast the event on a closed-circuit TV linkup.
sentences.chinese: 大会实况在大厅闭路电视上重播。

sentences.english: The swipes between replays (and even the replays themselves) looked more in tune with what I'd seen on TV than in other b-ball titles.
sentences.chinese: 画面重播和画面切换，看起来就跟在电视上看的一样。

sentences.english: This film will be shown on TV next Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 下星期天这部电影还要在电视上重播。

definition: to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
to broadcast over a network/(radio or TV) hookup/simulcast
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
abbr. for 臺灣電視公司|台湾电视公司, Taiwan Television (TTV)
satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
